record.description: First row, left to right: K. Fujita, outfield; S. Kikutani, pitcher; T. Ogasawara, catcher; A. Kashima, substitute; S. Hatanaka, 2nd base; K. Uchida, 3rd base; second row: K. Koba, substitute; K. Momose, catcher; K. Yamashiro, 1st base; G. Marshal, director, S. Kunitomo, outfield, S. Nakashima, outfield, T. Tsuji, pitcher, and J. Miura, outfield. Photographs above team, left to right: Captain K. Sekiguchi and President S. Kubota.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
